modName: Blocksteal Redux - Prevents accidentally pick up
summary:
this mod will prevent you from stealing, looting unneeded items
Register Basket is activation blocker register without stolen mark.
I did not want to pick up the plate/mag cup etc...
descriptionHtml:
This mod will prevent you from stealing, looting unneeded items(eg. plate, mag etc..)


--- REQUIREMENT ---

Skyrim 1.9.32
SKSE 1.7.3


--- HOW TO USE ---

Open MCM and check on "Activate".


MCM SETTINGS:
Activate - Activate this mod. default setting is uncheck.
Sneaking - Can pick up in sneak mode.
MultiTap - Can pick up item if activated after activate during a period of 0.3 seconds.
Register Basket - this is activation blocker register without stolen mark. I did not want to pick up the plate/mag cup etc...
Save Basket - Save the basket items to text file for newgame.
Load Basket - Load the basket items from text file.


REGISTER UNNEEDED ITEMS:
First, Open MCM. And, select "Register Basket".
Close mcm menu and Basket menu opens automatically after push YES in message window.
Put unneeded item in Register Basket.


ABOUT QUESTITEMS:
This mod have Quest item check function by own skse plugin for quest progress safety.
This code check the quest object flag status from the quest. so support all vanilla/mods quest.(except if the quest does not using the flag. e.g bear pelt quest of the Ivarstead)
However, If you don't need this feature, you can disable in ini file.(AllowCheckQuestObject=true to false)
(file path: data/SKSE/Plugins/PreventsAccidentPickUp.ini)


--- SUPPORTED OBJECT TYPE ---

Scroll , Armor, Ingredient, MiscObject, Tree, Flora, Weapon, Ammo, Key, Potion, Soulgem, Horse(Actor)


--- TRANSLATION ---

This mod was completed mostly. Don't need to get permission from us.
However, Please write this url and original auther because users can be known update this mod.


--- UNINSTALL ---

Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager, or manually delete the following files from the data folder

data/
PreventsAccidentPickUp.esp
PreventsAccidentPickUp.bsa
PreventsAccidentPickUp.bsl

data/skse/plugins/
PreventsAccidentPickUp.dll
PreventsAccidentPickUp.ini
PreventsAccidentPickUp.basket (if exist)


--- SPECIAL THANKS ---

himika
author: towawot
